item.title: D. Stempel: Fette Metropolis
item.author: mail@christianmahnke.de (Christian Mahnke)
item.description: The back of the ‘Die deutsche Zeitung ihr Werden, Wesen und Wirken’ offers a type specimen from the type foundry D. Stempel.

item.title: Der Tanz
item.author: mail@christianmahnke.de (Christian Mahnke)
item.description: The font Ehmcke Antiqua is by Fritz Helmuth Ehmcke.

item.title: Führer durch Magdeburg
item.author: mail@christianmahnke.de (Christian Mahnke)
item.description: Die Rückseite des “Führer durch Magdeburg” bietet eine sehr schön typografisch umgesetzte Werbung für das Kaufhaus Klavehn.

item.title: Uhlig Metallbuchstabenfabrik
item.author: mail@christianmahnke.de (Christian Mahnke)
item.description: Metal letters for business or delivery vans - also available gold-plated - are now rarely found in modern cities.

item.title: Figuren- oder Silhouetten-Schrift
item.author: mail@christianmahnke.de (Christian Mahnke)
item.description: Scenes from daily life at the time as letters.

item.title: Dasselbe mit Blättern und Ranken
item.author: mail@christianmahnke.de (Christian Mahnke)
item.description: “Dasselbe” (“Same”) here refers to the Arabic script from the previous pages.

item.title: Buchdruck-Schrift, Verzierte Klosterschrift
item.author: mail@christianmahnke.de (Christian Mahnke)
item.description: The letterpress typeface is better known today as Fraktur (black letter or gothic font)

item.title: Viel Glück und Freude im Neuen Jahre
item.author: mail@christianmahnke.de (Christian Mahnke)
item.description: A new single find, a post card for New year’s eve. It’s rather kitschy and very likely older than the postmark suggests. This is supported by the execution as a lithograph and the motif …

item.title: Stickmuster
item.author: mail@christianmahnke.de (Christian Mahnke)
item.description: Today a piece of fabric. Font designs for embroidery have already been shown here, now a cross-stitched font from 1909.

item.title: Die Weihnachtsgeschichte
item.author: mail@christianmahnke.de (Christian Mahnke)
item.description: Since the Advent season begin: The Christmas story in woodcuts.

item.title: Rechnungen
item.author: mail@christianmahnke.de (Christian Mahnke)
item.description: Right on time for Friday the 13th there are two invoices from 1910, the headers are particularly nice to look at, but the mixture of different fonts also reminds the dark days of Microsoft WordArt at the end of the 90s.

item.title: Sonderbund Denkschrift
item.author: mail@christianmahnke.de (Christian Mahnke)
item.description: Neben den Schriftmustern soll dieses Blog auch andere interessante typographische Fundstücke präsentieren, dies ist das Erste. Dieses Buch wurde in der Ehmcke Antiqua gesetzt.

item.title: Deutsche Druckschrift
item.author: mail@christianmahnke.de (Christian Mahnke)
item.description: The German letterpress typeface is better known today as Fraktur (black letter or gothic font)

item.title: About this blog
item.author: mail@christianmahnke.de (Christian Mahnke)
item.description: Since I was heavily involved in the field of optical character recognition (OCR) a few years ago, I also have a fairly extensive collection of font samples. Since I am no longer working on that topic, I would like to offer this collection as a resource for further developments. Typographically interesting individual items can also be added. Many of the patterns shown are now also available elsewhere on the Internet, sometimes even as font files.

Foundries and designers

  • Rosetta Type

item.title: Privacy policy
item.author: mail@christianmahnke.de (Christian Mahnke)
item.description:
Hosting

The hoster collects the following data transmitted by your browser in log files:

  • IP address
  • The address of the previously visited website (Referer [sic!] request header)
  • Date and time of the enquiry
  • Time zone difference to Greenwich Mean Time
  • Content of the request
  • HTTP status code
  • Amount of data transferred
  • Website from which the request originates
  • Information about the browser and operating system

This is necessary to display the website and to ensure stability and security. This corresponds to a legitimate interest within the meaning of Art. 6 para. 1 sentence 1 lit. f GDPR.

item.title: Weiterverwendung
item.author: mail@christianmahnke.de (Christian Mahnke)
item.description:
Die Digitalisate auf dieser Seite können für eigene Zwecke weiterverwendet werden.

The possibilities are endless: from backgrounds for websites to wrapping paper to paper for boxes and drawers, you can do a lot with it.

If someone invests some time to convert one or more of the templates into vector graphics and provide them, I will be happy to include them here.
